current.cta_first: Become a shark with my key business terms
current.first-slide-text: Daymond John has come a long way from turning a $40 budget into FUBU, a $6 billion fashion game-changer. Throughout his career, Daymond has continued to be an entrepreneur in every sense of the word. He is not only a pioneer in the fashion industry but a Shark on the 4-time Emmy Award winning Shark Tank, a New York Times best-selling author, branding guru, and highly sought-after motivational speaker.
current.second-slide-text: With years of experience as both a successful entrepreneur and mentor, Daymond landed a co-starring role on ABC’s business show, Shark Tank. Throughout his ten seasons on the show, Daymond has given countless aspiring entrepreneurs the opportunity to work alongside him and his team, showing them the ins and outs of what they need to take their business to the next level. As “The Peoples Shark”, Daymond has made an impact on the hopeful entrepreneurs vying for an investment in the Tank, as well as the millions of weekly viewers sitting at home, through his relatable story and journey to success that continues to both motivate and inspire. As the most watched program on Friday nights, Shark Tank has maintained an impressive average weekly viewership of over 8 million and has won 4 Emmy Awards. Shark Tank is also syndicated on CNBC, and continues to be the channel’s top rated show.
current.third-slide-text: Daymond created his brand consulting company, The Shark Group, to reveal the secrets that made FUBU a $6 billion global brand and reinvigorated the once defunct Coogi brand into the biggest fashion line in its space. Consulting for some of the top Fortune 500 as well as some of the most innovative, growing companies in the world. Daymond and The Shark Group share advice and experience on branding, licensing, social media, influencer integration, marketing strategy and overall business consultation. As a brand consultant, Daymond and his team will examine the needs of the corporation, dissect the problems and create manageable solutions for brand growth.
current.fourth-slide-text-1: As a motivational speaker, Daymond's quintessential rags-to-riches success story of sacrifice, hard work, and perseverance as well as the unique and charismatic way he communicates it, will inspire any audience.
current.fourth-slide-text-2: With a unique “music inspired” keynote and his famous fireside chat, Daymond has the unique ability to step out of the tank and give you a look behind the curtain and the secrets he used to become a massive success.
current.fifth-slide-text-1: As a consultant, Daymond will examine the needs of your business, dissect the problems, and create manageable solutions for brand growth. He will also help improve your business' profitability by enhancing the marketing structure and strategy.
current.fifth-slide-text-2: As a motivational speaker, Daymond's quintessential rags-to-riches success story of sacrifice, hard work, and perseverance as well as the unique and charismatic way he communicates it, will inspire any audience.
current.pob_cta_text: FREE CHAPTER OF THE POWER OF BROKE AND A FREE GUIDE ON MY SHARK POINTS
current.quote_text: From humble beginnings to the personification of the American dream, "The People’s Shark"®, Daymond John, shares his rags-to-riches journey.

current.ambassador_content: Reflecting on the past years, I am blown away by the incredible response I have received and continue to receive for The Power of Broke and now, Rise and Grind. Every day on social media, through email and in person, I see how these book shave inspired you all to think outside the box and recognize the resources you didn’t know you had. This past January, I officially launched my newest book, Rise and Grind. As the follow up to The Power of Broke, I’ve interviewed some of the world’s most successful people as they share the daily habits, rituals and routines that have helped them overcome challenges and remain focused on the road to success. At the end of the day, you’ve got to rise and grind, because grit, persistence and good old-fashioned hard work are the backbone to success. I worked tirelessly for the past two years to make sure that this book is perfect, going through it word by word and page by page – practicing what I preach, of course. But, we can’t forget about the power of teamwork. An entrepreneur is only as good as those they surround themselves with. That is why I am writing you to join my team of Ambassadors. I need your help to continue spreading this important message, not only to aspiring entrepreneurs but to all the executives working for big corporations, moms raising families and students working toward graduation. The message portrayed reveals the keys to maximizing your 24 hours each and every day. And, I want you on my team to help spread it. Join me on this journey.
current.ambassador_title2: As a Rise and Grind Ambassador, you get to work with me on this new project.
current.ambassador_content2:
Some of the perks of being an Ambassador include:
  • An opportunity to work with Daymond John and his team
  • • An opportunity to receive Rise and Grind Swag, signed books, exclusive offers & other giveaways
  • Invitation to an EXCLUSIVE Facebook Community
  • Receive never before seen content crafted just for the Ambassador team
  • Access to a Webinar with Daymond John
  • And more!
